Accessibility Features

The Tree component supports the following accessibility features:

  • Keyboard navigation with arrow keys, Home/End, Enter, and Space
  • ARIA attributes for screen reader compatibility
  • Focus management for keyboard users
  • High contrast visual indicators

Usage Instructions

To use the Tree component in your application:


<gds-tree 
  data="[{key: '1', label: 'Node 1', children: [{key: '1-1', label: 'Child 1'}]}]"
  selectionMode="single"
  showIcons
></gds-tree>
